mapper.select: SELECT a.account_id AS accountId ,b.customer_nm AS customerNm ,b.customer_email AS customerEmail ,b.customer_phone_number AS customerPhoneNumber ,c.address AS Address ,c.city AS City ,c.province AS Province ,c.postal_cd AS postalCd FROM account a LEFT OUTER JOIN customer b ON b.account_id = a.account_id LEFT OUTER JOIN account_address c ON c.account_id = a.account_id WHERE a.account_id = #{accountId}
